resources.string: Draw a card or call Cameo.
Draw a card, call Cameo, or tap your card to pull out a card.
Switch with your card or play.
Choose one of your bottom cards to look at.
Choose one of your top cards to look at.
Choose one of your cards to switch with a new card.
Your opponent called Cameo! Draw a card or call Cameo.
Current state is not assigned properly.
Tap your card again when you are done.
Tap your card to pull out a card.
Too bad! Your card has a different number!
Too bad! Your card has a different number! Draw a card or call Cameo.
